title: Possum Tales: ...in the Lettuce Patch
description: Poss is a bit of a day-dreamer. He never finds the time or the energy to look for food. He cannot understand Milly's concerns. She is extremely upset. The job of searching for the day's meal is always left up to her. Though, Poss never seems to mind. He is never hungry. However, in the lettuce patch...
author: SKETA
